about_the_game:
Overview
In the dystopian future, you are tasked with delivering across the galactic empire. Complete deliveries by ensuring safe travel aboard the train, making the business thrive! From your CCTV you can monitor and react to all incidents within the train. All of your tools utilise the power, which you must manage or risk leaving the entire train open for the taking. Package thieves aim to ruin your career prospects. Avoid their ambushes and keep them away from the customers packages!

Realistic Managers!

The future is bright, but not for you. People need their damn packages on time, and you’ve got a tight schedule. Board the train, and keep it going until you reach the destination. Stop those pesky parcel thieves and sacrifice your life if you must, you’re all replaceable anyway.

Train Simulation

Feed the train juice to keep the power running! Run out? That’ll come out of YOUR pay check. 

(maybe) Kind Enemies!

There’ll be a few people out to get you, but not to worry! Simply sacrifice yourself for that sweet sweet bonus!

Trust our Reviews!

“I ordered my new charger from the Planetary Delivery Boys and it said it’d take two days to arrive! Good thing I had Planetary Delivery Plus allowing it to enter my solar system by the end of the day! How could people live without it!” - A Planet Delivery Plus member

content_descriptors.notes: General horror themes, with blood and violence from alien-like creatures. The player is mainly in a survival setting with their options including hiding or running.

name: Planetary Delivery Boys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Planetary Delivery Boys must defend the corporations train from unknown package thieves and successfully deliver the customers order.
